welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lathrop, the charming city known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy our city during your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stockton Metropolitan Airport serves all commercial flights and includes a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Stockton Metropolitan Airport is used for private and charter flights, and offers a more exclusive and personalized experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Livermore Airport provides services for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Livermore Airport offers luxurious amenities for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
